Package fi.tuni.prog3.sisu

Class AlertDialogController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.AlertDialogController
public class AlertDialogController
extends java.lang.Object
Confirmation dialog to delete current profile or change the language to English.

    • asking

      public void asking​(int askingId, javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Defines which one of operations will be executed.
      Parameters:
      askingId - 1 = delete user, 2=change language
      event - of the mouse clicked either on "en" in top bar or "delete" on profile tab.
